articles.title: HDFC raises lending rate by 5 basis points; EMI to rise for existing borrower - Economic Times
articles.description: HDFC increases its Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) on Housing loans, on which its Adjustable Rate Home Loans (ARHL) are benchmarked, by 5 basis points, with effect from May 1, 2022,  the company said in a statement.
articles.content:
